---
title: "Links & Resources"
description: Peruse my favorite research and reference sources on ecological science, GIS, coding in R, and much more.
---


![Credit: Ben Tjepkes](img-ben-with-bear.jpg)

I think everyone has certain websites and other reference material they always come back to. This page outlines those on my list --- feel free to bookmark these for your use as well. If you have suggestions on additions, please reach out.

## Resources for **Wildlifers**
### Job Resources

- [Blog Post ~ Job Boards To Find An Impactful Career in Nature](https://conservationcompanion.com/blog/job-boards-to-find-an-impactful-career-in-nature)
- [Website ~ Careers in Conservation Job Board List](https://diversityinconservationjobs.org/jobs/)

### Reproducible Reporting

- [Website ~ Quarto from Posit](https://quarto.org/)

### Mapping and Spatial Data

- [Website ~ RSpatial: Spatial Data Science in R](https://rspatial.org/)
